parameters.query:
INSERT INTO customers (
    phone_number,
    name,
    status,
    source_channel,
    created_at,
    assigned_salesperson
) VALUES (
    '{{ $('principalFields').item.json.phoneNumber }}',
    '{{ $('principalFields').item.json.pushName }}',
    'new',
    '{{ $('VeioDeAnuncio').item.json.veio_de_anuncio ? "advertising" : "whatsapp" }}',
    '{{ $now }}',
    NULL
) RETURNING *;

INSERT INTO customer_preferences (
    customer_id,
    price_range_min,
    price_range_max,
    preferred_car_type,
    preferred_payment_method,
    has_trade_in,
    updated_at
) VALUES (
    '{{ $json.id }}',
    NULL,
    NULL,
    NULL,
    NULL,
    false,
    '{{ $now }}'
) RETURNING *;

INSERT INTO customer_interactions_summary (
    customer_id,
    interaction_stage,
    conversion_probability,
    updated_at
) VALUES (
    '{{ $('CriarCliente').item.json.id }}',
    'initial',
    20,
    '{{ $now }}'
) RETURNING *;

SELECT 
    c.id,
    c.phone_number,
    c.name,
    c.email,
    c.status,
    c.source_channel,
    c.assigned_salesperson,
    c.last_interaction,
    c.total_interactions,
    c.lead_score,
  
    cp.price_range_min,
    cp.price_range_max,
    cp.preferred_car_type,
    cp.preferred_year_min,
    cp.preferred_payment_method,
    cp.has_trade_in,
    cp.trade_in_brand,
    cp.trade_in_model,
    cp.trade_in_year,
    cp.trade_in_estimated_value,
    cp.id as cpid,

    cis.last_model_viewed,
    cis.last_car_id_interested,
    cis.interaction_stage,
    cis.preferred_contact_time,
    cis.last_objection_type,
    cis.conversion_probability,
    cis.objections_count,
    cis.next_followup_date,
    cis.tools_used_count,
    cis.total_session_time,
    cis.last_objection,  
    cis.id as cisid
FROM customers c
LEFT JOIN customer_preferences cp ON c.id = cp.customer_id
LEFT JOIN customer_interactions_summary cis ON c.id = cis.customer_id
WHERE c.phone_number = '{{ $('principalFields').item.json.phoneNumber }}';

UPDATE customers
SET 
    last_interaction = '{{ $now }}',
    total_interactions = total_interactions + 1,
    status = CASE 
             WHEN total_interactions + 1 > 1 THEN 'contacted'
             ELSE status
           END
WHERE id = {{ $json.id }};

## SUA FUN√á√ÉO:

SELECT 
    c.id,
    c.phone_number,
    c.name,
    c.email,
    c.status,
  c.total_interactions,
  c.last_interaction,
    c.source_channel,
    c.assigned_salesperson,
    
    cp.price_range_min,
    cp.price_range_max,
    cp.preferred_car_type,
    cp.preferred_payment_method,
    cp.has_trade_in,
    cp.trade_in_brand,
    cp.trade_in_model,

    cp.id as cpid,

WHERE c.phone_number = '{{ $('principalFields').item.json.phoneNumber }}';

## CATEGORIAS DISPON√çVEIS E MAPEAMENTO:

## EXEMPLOS COM REGRAS APLICADAS:

-- ===========================================
-- TOOL 4: AtualizarSummaryInteracao
-- ===========================================
-- Atualiza stage detalhado e probabilidade baseado no progresso
WITH pref AS (
  SELECT
    cp.customer_id,
    (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL)                          AS has_min,
    (cp.price_range_max IS NOT NULL)                          AS has_max,
    (cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL)                       AS has_type,
    (cp.preferred_payment_method IS NOT NULL)                 AS has_pay,
    (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL AND
     cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL AND
     cp.preferred_payment_method IS NOT NULL)                 AS essentials_done
  FROM customer_preferences cp
  WHERE cp.customer_id = $1
)
UPDATE customer_interactions_summary s
SET
  interaction_stage = CASE
    WHEN p.essentials_done THEN 'preferences_complete'
    WHEN (p.has_min OR p.has_max OR p.has_type OR p.has_pay) THEN 'collecting_preferences'
    ELSE s.interaction_stage
  END,
  conversion_probability = CASE
    WHEN p.essentials_done THEN LEAST(s.conversion_probability + 20, 90)
    WHEN ((p.has_min OR p.has_max) AND p.has_type) THEN LEAST(s.conversion_probability + 15, 90)
    WHEN (p.has_min OR p.has_type OR p.has_pay) THEN LEAST(s.conversion_probability + 10, 90)
    ELSE s.conversion_probability
  END,
  tools_used_count = jsonb_set(
    COALESCE(s.tools_used_count, '{}'::jsonb),
    '{prompt_2}',
    to_jsonb( COALESCE((s.tools_used_count->>'prompt_2')::int, 0) + 1 ),
    true
  ),
  updated_at = NOW()
FROM pref p
WHERE s.customer_id = p.customer_id;

-- ===========================================
-- TOOL: AtualizarStatusCliente
-- ===========================================
-- Atualiza status macro do cliente e registra intera√ß√£o

UPDATE customers 
SET 
    status = CASE 
        -- Evolu√ß√£o baseada em contexto e a√ß√µes
        -- WHEN status = 'new' THEN 'contacted'
        
        WHEN status = 'contacted' AND (
            -- Se coletou prefer√™ncias essenciais
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_preferences cp 
                WHERE cp.customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }}
                AND (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL OR cp.price_range_max IS NOT NULL)
                AND cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL
            )
        ) THEN 'interested'
        
        WHEN status = 'interested' AND (
            -- Se j√° viu estoque (prompt_3 executado)
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_interactions_summary cis
                WHERE cis.customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }}
                AND cis.interaction_stage IN ('evaluating_options', 'interested_specific')
            )
        ) THEN 'qualified'
        
        WHEN status = 'qualified' AND (
            -- Se demonstrou interesse espec√≠fico ou alta probabilidade
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_interactions_summary cis
                WHERE cis.customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }}
                AND cis.conversion_probability >= 70
            )
        ) THEN 'ready_to_schedule'
        
        ELSE status -- Mant√©m status atual se n√£o atender crit√©rios
    END,
    
    last_interaction = NOW(),
    total_interactions = total_interactions + 1,
    updated_at = NOW()
    
WHERE id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }};

-- ===========================================
-- TOOL: AtualizarSummaryInteracao  
-- ===========================================
-- Atualiza micro-stages, probabilidade e m√©tricas detalhadas

UPDATE customer_interactions_summary 
SET 
    interaction_stage = CASE 
        -- Evolu√ß√£o baseada na ferramenta executada
        
        -- prompt_1_abertura
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_1_abertura' 
        THEN 'greeted'
        
        -- prompt_2_identificar_interesse
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_2_identificar_interesse' 
        THEN CASE
            WHEN EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_preferences cp
                WHERE cp.customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }}
                AND cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL 
                AND cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL 
                AND cp.preferred_payment_method IS NOT NULL
            ) THEN 'preferences_complete'
            ELSE 'collecting_preferences'
        END
        
        -- prompt_3_apresentar_estoque
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_3_apresentar_estoque'
        THEN 'evaluating_options'
        
        -- prompt_4_detalhar_veiculo
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_4_detalhar_veiculo'
        THEN 'interested_specific'
        
        -- prompt_5_qualificar_interesse
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_5_qualificar_interesse'
        THEN 'qualified'
        
        -- prompt_6_agendar_visita
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_6_agendar_visita'
        THEN 'scheduling'
        
        -- prompt_7_reconhecer_anuncio
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_7_reconhecer_anuncio'
        THEN 'ad_validation'
        
        -- prompt_8_detalhar_anunciado
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_8_detalhar_anunciado'
        THEN 'interested_ad_specific'
        
        -- prompt_9_quebrar_objecoes
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_9_quebrar_objecoes'
        THEN 'hesitating'
        
        -- prompt_10_conduzir_visita
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_10_conduzir_visita'
        THEN 'nudging_visit'
        
        -- prompt_11_confirmar_agendamento
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_11_confirmar_agendamento'
        THEN 'scheduled'
        
        -- prompt_12_tratar_objecoes
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_12_tratar_objecoes'
        THEN 'objecting'
        
        -- prompt_13_qualificar_troca
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_13_qualificar_troca'
        THEN 'trade_evaluation'
        
        ELSE interaction_stage -- Mant√©m se ferramenta n√£o mapeada
    END,
    
    conversion_probability = CASE 
        -- Ajuste baseado na ferramenta e progresso
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_1_abertura'
        THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 5, 90) -- Primeiro contato positivo
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_2_identificar_interesse'
        THEN CASE
            -- Se completou prefer√™ncias essenciais
            WHEN EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_preferences cp
                WHERE cp.customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }}
                AND cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL 
                AND cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL 
                AND cp.preferred_payment_method IS NOT NULL
            ) THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 15, 90)
            -- Se coletou pelo menos 1 prefer√™ncia
            WHEN EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_preferences cp
                WHERE cp.customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }}
                AND (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL OR cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL)
            ) THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 10, 90)
            ELSE LEAST(conversion_probability + 5, 90)
        END
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_3_apresentar_estoque'
        THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 12, 90) -- Viu op√ß√µes
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_4_detalhar_veiculo'
        THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 20, 90) -- Interesse espec√≠fico alto
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_5_qualificar_interesse'
        THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 8, 90) -- Qualifica√ß√£o em andamento
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_6_agendar_visita'
        THEN LEAST(conversion_probability + 25, 90) -- Muito pr√≥ximo da convers√£o
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_9_quebrar_objecoes'
        THEN GREATEST(conversion_probability - 5, 10) -- Reduz por hesita√ß√£o
        
        WHEN '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' = 'prompt_12_tratar_objecoes'
        THEN GREATEST(conversion_probability - 10, 10) -- Reduz por obje√ß√£o
        
        ELSE conversion_probability -- Mant√©m para outras ferramentas
    END,
    
    -- Registra qual ferramenta foi usada
    tools_used_count = jsonb_set(
        COALESCE(tools_used_count, '{}'::jsonb),
        '{' || '{{ $json.tool_executed }}' || '}', 
        COALESCE((tools_used_count->>('{{ $json.tool_executed }}')), '0')::int + 1, 
        true
    ),
    
    -- Atualiza timestamp da √∫ltima modifica√ß√£o
    updated_at = NOW()
    
WHERE customer_id = {{ $('Aggregate').item.json.data[0].customer_data.id }};

-- ===========================================
-- TOOL 1: VerificarEstoqueDisponivelPorPreferencia
-- ===========================================
-- Verifica se existem carros dispon√≠veis baseado nas prefer√™ncias mencionadas

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_disponivel,
    MIN(price) as preco_minimo,
    MAX(price) as preco_maximo,
    ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT car_type) as tipos_disponiveis,
    ARRAY_AGG(DISTINCT brand || ' ' || model) as modelos_exemplo
FROM cars 
WHERE 
    status = 'available'
    AND (
        -- Se cliente mencionou faixa de pre√ßo
        CASE 
            WHEN {{ $fromAI('buscar_menor_preco_mencionado', 'Pre√ßo m√≠nimo que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'number', null) }} IS NOT NULL 
                 OR {{ $fromAI('buscar_maior_preco_mencionado', 'Pre√ßo m√°ximo que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'number', null) }} IS NOT NULL
            THEN price BETWEEN 
                COALESCE({{ $fromAI('buscar_menor_preco_mencionado', 'Pre√ßo m√≠nimo que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'number', null) }}, 0)
                AND COALESCE({{ $fromAI('buscar_maior_preco_mencionado', 'Pre√ßo m√°ximo que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'number', null) }}, 999999)
            ELSE TRUE
        END
    )
    AND (
        -- Se cliente mencionou tipo espec√≠fico
        CASE 
            WHEN '{{ $fromAI('tipo_de_carro_mencionado', 'Tipo de carro que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'string', '') }}' != ''
            THEN UPPER(car_type) = UPPER('{{ $fromAI('tipo_de_carro_mencionado', 'Tipo de carro que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'string', '') }}')
            ELSE TRUE
        END
    )
    AND (
        -- Se cliente mencionou ano m√≠nimo
        CASE 
            WHEN {{ $fromAI('menor_ano_mencionado', 'Ano m√≠nimo que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'number', null) }} IS NOT NULL
            THEN year >= {{ $fromAI('menor_ano_mencionado', 'Ano m√≠nimo que o cliente mencionou na mensagem atual', 'number', null) }}
            ELSE TRUE
        END
    );

-- ===========================================
-- 1: AtualizarPreferenciasCliente
-- ===========================================
-- Atualiza prefer√™ncias do cliente baseado na mensagem atual
UPDATE customer_preferences 
SET 
  price_range_min = COALESCE($1, price_range_min),
  price_range_max = COALESCE($2, price_range_max),
  preferred_car_type = case when $3 != 'x' then COALESCE($3, preferred_car_type) else preferred_car_type end,
  preferred_year_min = COALESCE($4, preferred_year_min),
  preferred_payment_method = case when $5 != 'x' then COALESCE($5, preferred_payment_method) else preferred_payment_method end,
  has_trade_in = COALESCE($6, has_trade_in),
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE customer_id = $7;

-- 2. Atualizar customers (evolu√ß√£o inteligente)
UPDATE customers 
SET 
    status = CASE 
        WHEN status = 'contacted' AND (
            -- Se coletou prefer√™ncias essenciais (pre√ßo E tipo)
            EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 FROM customer_preferences cp 
                WHERE cp.customer_id = $7
                AND (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL OR cp.price_range_max IS NOT NULL)
                AND cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL
            )
        ) THEN 'interested'
        -- WHEN status = 'new' THEN 'contacted' -- prompt_1 faz isso
        ELSE status 
    END,
    last_interaction = NOW(),
    total_interactions = total_interactions + 1
WHERE id = $7;

-- ===========================================
-- 3: AtualizarSummaryInteracao
-- ===========================================
-- Atualiza stage detalhado e probabilidade baseado no progresso
WITH pref AS (
  SELECT
    cp.customer_id,
    (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL)                          AS has_min,
    (cp.price_range_max IS NOT NULL)                          AS has_max,
    (cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL)                       AS has_type,
    (cp.preferred_payment_method IS NOT NULL)                 AS has_pay,
    (cp.price_range_min IS NOT NULL AND
     cp.preferred_car_type IS NOT NULL AND
     cp.preferred_payment_method IS NOT NULL)                 AS essentials_done
  FROM customer_preferences cp
  WHERE cp.customer_id = $7
)
UPDATE customer_interactions_summary s
SET
  interaction_stage = CASE
    WHEN p.essentials_done THEN 'preferences_complete'
    WHEN (p.has_min OR p.has_max OR p.has_type OR p.has_pay) THEN 'collecting_preferences'
    ELSE s.interaction_stage
  END,
  conversion_probability = CASE
    WHEN p.essentials_done THEN LEAST(s.conversion_probability + 20, 90)
    WHEN ((p.has_min OR p.has_max) AND p.has_type) THEN LEAST(s.conversion_probability + 15, 90)
    WHEN (p.has_min OR p.has_type OR p.has_pay) THEN LEAST(s.conversion_probability + 10, 90)
    ELSE s.conversion_probability
  END,
  tools_used_count = jsonb_set(
    COALESCE(s.tools_used_count, '{}'::jsonb),
    '{prompt_2}',
    to_jsonb( COALESCE((s.tools_used_count->>'prompt_2')::int, 0) + 1 ),
    true
  ),
  updated_at = NOW()
FROM pref p
WHERE s.customer_id = p.customer_id;
